scripts.build:html: cd app && gleam run -m build && mkdir -p arctic_build/src && cp src/app.css arctic_build/src/
scripts.pretest: npm ci && cd app && rm -rf build && gleam deps download
scripts.test: npm run docker:run 'npm run pretest && npx playwright test'
scripts.test:update-snapshots: npm run docker:run 'npm run pretest && npx playwright test --update-snapshots'
